All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Administrator
The Administrator class represents an administrator with a name and password.
Main
 
MainTest
 
Profesor
The Profesor class represents a professor with a name, password, and the course they are assigned to teach.
ScannerInt
The ScannerInt class provides utility methods for reading integers from the console with input validation.
ScannerString
The ScannerString class provides utility methods for reading strings from the console.
Student
The Student class represents a student with a name, password, year of study, faculty, specialization, a list of courses, and a map of grades for each course.
